keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: The latest bogus charges against Nabeel Rajab, a human rights activist in Bahrain, illustrate how repressive its rulers have become.
snippet: The latest bogus charges against Nabeel Rajab, a human rights activist in Bahrain, illustrate how repressive its rulers have become....
abstract: Editorial criticizes authorities in Bahrain for charging human rights activist Nabeel Rajab with deliberately disseminating false news and rumors against state by writing op-ed article for The New York Times; observes United States has been reluctant to confront nation's rulers more forcefully because of US troop presence in country; suggests US should look for alternative regional hub if Bahrain continues to flout human rights of its citizens.
